p: Seed yield per m 2 of A. artemisiifolia in various habitats was ranked as follows: farmland ecotone >residential area >grassland >roadside. Seed yield per m 2 of A. trifida in various habitats differed as follows: grassland >farmland ecotone > residential area >roadside. Seed yield per m 2 of A. artemisiifolia was less than that of A. trifida in all habitats (Figure 5).
